pullRequest.title: Add customization for colors used throughout MekHQ #1480
pullRequest.bodyText: This allows customization (without a UX at the moment) for colors throughout MekHQ, providing the backend work to #1480. Each property has a main and alternate color, currently used for backgrounds and foregrounds respectively. The values are saved in mmconf/mekhq.preferences as a pair of colors separated by a pipe, e.g. #ff0000|#000000. Each of the colors provides a default value based on our original colors.

commit.message: Adds settings for the hangar tab colors #1480
Remove unnecessary imports added during theming work
Allow various colors across MHQ to be customized #1480
